availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John T. Henry (Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer and carpenter.)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer and carpenter. Kentucky native. Son of George Henry and Elizabeth Henry. Married to Hannah Elizabeth Bowman Henry in Harrison County, Kentucky, on February 24, 1857. Father of James Henry and Ann Henry. Farmer in Harrison County in 1850. Carpenter in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 1, p. 83B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 464.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, Film #000216888.
"John T Henry (1828-1906)," Find A Grave, Memorial #147247707, accessed January 12, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/147247707.
